plot: A woman, scared by motherhood and her new born baby, runs away from her home and family to find a shelter at her upstairs neighbor's place.
title: Le lait de la tendresse humaine
plot_es: A woman, scared by motherhood and her new born baby, runs away from her home and family to find a shelter at her upstairs neighbor's place.
original_name: Le lait de la tendresse humaine
plot_en: A woman, scared by motherhood and her new born baby, runs away from her home and family to find a shelter at her upstairs neighbor's place.

produce.name: Centre du Cinéma et de l'Audiovisuel de la Communauté Française de Belgique
